name: top_headlines
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool news_api_v2.
Tool description: Google News and Bing News Alternative. The Best API to Search News from the 2500+ Publishers Around The World. 
API description: Fetches top headline news articles based on specified parameters.

language.description: en, zh-Hans, zh-Hant, id, cs, uk, he, ar, de, es-419, ja, ko, fr, it, lv, lt, ml, th, hu, nl, no, pl, pt-419, pt-150, ro, sk, sl, sv, vi, tr, el, bg, ru, sr, mr, hi, bn, ta, te

category.description:
Possible options: business, science, sports, entertainment, health, technology

Default value: all categories

country.description: MY, GB, CN, TW, AU, BW, ET, KR, GH, IE, KE, LV, NA, IN, BD, TH, NZ, NG, PK, PH, SG, ZA, TZ, UG, ZW, ID, CZ, DE, AT, CH, AR, EG, CL, CO, CU, US, MX, PE, VE, LB, CA, FR, MA, SN, IT, LT, HK, JP, HU, BE, NL, NO, PL, BR, PT, RO, SK, SI, SE, VN, TR, GR, BG, RU, RS, UA, IL, AE, SA

sortby.description: Criterion to sort news articles by. Default is 'published_date'.

pagesize.description: Number of news articles to return per page. Default is 10.
